data.title: One Life to Live Episode Counts: October 2011 Edition
data.meta_description: "One Life to Live" October and 2011 Year-to-Date Episode Counts.
data.text:
(SoapOperaNetwork.com) — “One Life to Live” October and 2011 Year-to-Date Episode Counts.

Credit if Copying and Pasting, and remember to link to this post. Thank you.

Thanks to alexisfan07 for assistance with compiling the episode counts.

ONE LIFE TO LIVE

October 2011 Episode Counts

21 new episodes in October ’11

Listed below are the total # of episodes each actor appeared in for the month of October, and the percentages of total episodes each actor earned for the month of October.

Note: “OLTL” was pre-empted from approximately 2:05 pm ET until 2:18 pm ET on October 20 for ABC News Special Report of the death of Moammar Gadhafi.

Major recurring cast NOT appearing this month: Peter Bartlett (Nigel Bartholomew-Smythe), Patricia Elliott (Renée Divine Buchanan), Frankie Faison (Richard Evans), Kearran Giovanni (Vivian Wright), Jessica Leccia (Inez Salinger), Tonye Patano (Phylicia Evans), Pamela Payton-Wright (Addie Cramer), and J.J. Singleton (Darren Price).

———————————————————————————————————————————————————————–

ONE LIFE TO LIVE

Episode Counts for January-October, 2011

212 total new episodes in ’11

Listed below are the total # of episodes each actor appeared in so far during 2011, and the percentages of total episodes each actor earned for the year.

NOTE: Totals DO NOT include either the January 19 encore airing of the February 26, 2006 episode, nor the February 11 encore airing of the November 14, 1995 episode.

Note: The next-day previews and closing credits were pre-empted on February 2 for an extended ABC News Brief covering the civil unrest in Egypt.

Note: “OLTL” was pre-empted from approximately 2:05 pm ET until 2:18 pm ET on October 20 for ABC News Special Report of the death of Moammar Gadhafi.
